name: Aruballo.GitHub.io
body:
### Welcome to my Github page.
This page was created using Github's automatic page generator. I intend to add links to projects, and occasionally blog. Enjoy! 

### Neighborhood App
This application was created completely from scratch. The idea comes from a prompt at the end of an Udacity course I took linked here:
[Intro to Javascript Design Patterns](https://www.udacity.com/course/viewer#!/c-ud989/l-3417188540/m-3374098584)

You can find the live application here:
[Neighborhood App](http://aruballo.github.io/neighborhoodapp/)

It is a simple app that lets you search for "Interesting" locations near you, using Yelp APIs, like restaurants, barbershops, gas stations, etc. You can find my github repo here:
<https://github.com/aruballo/neighborhoodapp>
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
